<meta property="og:description" content="The day we decide to have babies and raise a family we savor every moment because we know one day they’ll grow up and move out of the house. I used to dread that day too. Just thinking about it would make me sad and the water works would start. But as my kids grew up, who are now a teen and young adults, the hubs and I have a lot more time to spend with each other, now that the kids are doing their own thing. I started to think, if it’s good now, can you imagine how much" />

<li id="menu-item-16434" class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-16434"><a href="http://www.brendapace.net/home/" itemprop="url"><span itemprop="name">Work With Me</span></a></li>
</ul></div></nav><div class="site-inner"><div class="content-sidebar-wrap"><main class="content"><div class="breadcrumb" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/BreadcrumbList">You are here: <span class="breadcrumb-link-wrap" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/ListItem"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/" itemprop="item"><span itemprop="name">Home</span></a></span> <span aria-label="breadcrumb separator">/</span> <span class="breadcrumb-link-wrap" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/ListItem"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/category/life/" itemprop="item"><span itemprop="name">Life</span></a></span> <span aria-label="breadcrumb separator">/</span> The Benefits of Becoming an Empty Nester</div><article class="post-15940 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-life tag-empty-nest tag-life tag-lifestyle entry" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/CreativeWork"><header class="entry-header"><h1 class="entry-title" itemprop="headline">The Benefits of Becoming an Empty Nester</h1> 
<p class="entry-meta"><time class="entry-time" itemprop="datePublished" datetime="2016-02-03T05:00:17+00:00">February 3, 2016</time> </p></header><div class="entry-content" itemprop="text"><p><img class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-16156" src="http://i0.wp.com/www.mygirlyparts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/The-Benefits-of-Becoming-an-Empty-Nester-1.jpg?resize=700%2C500" alt="The Benefits of Becoming an Empty Nester (1)" srcset="http://i0.wp.com/www.mygirlyparts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/The-Benefits-of-Becoming-an-Empty-Nester-1.jpg?resize=300%2C214 300w, http://i0.wp.com/www.mygirlyparts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/The-Benefits-of-Becoming-an-Empty-Nester-1.jpg?w=700 700w, http://i0.wp.com/www.mygirlyparts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/The-Benefits-of-Becoming-an-Empty-Nester-1.jpg?resize=600%2C429 600w" sizes="(max-width: 700px) 100vw, 700px" data-recalc-dims="1" />The day we decide to have babies and raise a family we savor every moment because we know one day they’ll grow up and move out of the house.</p>
<p>I used to dread that day too. Just thinking about it would make me sad and the water works would start.</p>
<p>But as my kids grew up, who are now a teen and young adults, the hubs and I have a lot more time to spend with each other, now that the kids are doing their own thing. I started to think, if it’s good now, can you imagine how much fun we’re going to have when they’re all out of the house?</p>
<p>I changed with my mindset at becoming an empty nester. Instead of thinking how quiet and empty the house will be, I soon realized isn’t going to be such a bad thing after all. In fact, it’s like a new chapter in my life and for the hubs.</p>
<p>Instead of being sad at the thought about the kids moving out of the house, think of the things you can do with your sweetie pie when you become an empty nester.</p>
<p>Here are some examples of what you can do.</p>
<h2>Turn an Extra Bedroom into Your Dream Room</h2>
<p>With the kids out of the house now you can turn the extra bedroom into your own dream room. Have you ever wanted a workout room, a library or even a gift wrapping room? How about the hubs? Has he ever mentioned turning the extra room into a man cave?</p>
<p>The possibilities are endless and the only tough decision to make is which one will get the room of their dreams, hehe.</p>
<h2>The Cost of Living is Not as Expensive</h2>
<p>This is one thing I’m looking forward to. Right now I spend about $200 a week on groceries and that’s just four us, although my 22-year-old is about 6’4” and eats like a linebacker! My parents are empty nesters and my dad says their grocery bill is less than $100 a week and most of the time they dine out. I can’t wait for the day I no longer have to cook!</p>
<h2>Travel More</h2>
<p>When the kids were little we took a road trip to San Antonio, Texas. We could survive a three-hour drive, right? Wrong! The kids were tired; they were bored and were hungry. We had to make frequent pit stops so they can go potty, ugh. And the complaining, I’ve never heard such noise…and that was the hubs, lol!</p>
<p>Now that it’s you and your spouse, you can take the vacations you’ve dreamed about. Number one, the cost is less than a family vacation. And second, it’s a time to <a href="http://notnowmomsbusy.com/stay-connected-sweetie/" target="_blank">connect with your sweetie</a>.</p>
<h2>Speaking of Connecting With Your Sweetie</h2>
<p>The time alone at home is a great chance to get reacquainted with your significant other without the distractions of kids and crazy schedules. You can actually have adult conversations and even a little afternoon delight if they so please!</p>
<h2>Time to Focus on You</h2>
<p>Now that the kids are out of the house you can focus on you. Take on a hobby, attend a class, do some volunteer work. The possibilities are endless!</p>
<p>So while you’re going down memory lane and reminiscing about the time when your kiddos were little, think about the new and exciting journey you’re about to embark on with your spouse or significant other!</p>
<h2>How about you?</h2>
<p>What are you looking forward to most about becoming an empty nester? Tell us about it in the comments section below.</p>

		<div class="sw-tweet-clear"></div>

world! I'm Cori. I'm blogging from my home in Houston, Texas. I talk about life with teens, relationships, health, beauty and fashion. I also do product reviews - if it's going to make our lives easier, I'm all for it! I look for great deals to save money because I have to and I share what I've learned about blogging and social media because I love helping people. And if you're looking for a work-from-home job, I'm here to tell you where you can find 'em.</p>

		<div class="comment-content" itemprop="text">
			
			<p>OMG Cori.  My kids are still with me, grown kids and grandchildren.  I&#8217;m looking forward to an empty nest at some point in time although it does make me sad.  I&#8217;m waiting for all the wonderful time I can have but at the same time I  know I&#8217;ll be lonely but I&#8217;ll adjust.  I love all the reasons you mentioned that I never thought of before.</p>
<p>Thanks for the inspiration. 😉</p>

<p>I&#8217;m still have a bunch of years to go before I&#8217;m an empty nester. Now, when I tell my son that one day he&#8217;ll live at college he still asks, &#8220;Why? I want to live with you forever.&#8221; Thanks for this post to help me imagine the next phase with my kiddos &#8211; when they&#8217;re living on their own!</p>
<p>Best,</p>
<p>Alli</p>

	<li class="comment even thread-even depth-1" id="comment-7749">
	<article itemprop="comment" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment">

		
		<header class="comment-header">
			<p class="comment-author" itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
				<img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/c1b0e38cd5573602ca7f908eb3b2abd0?s=60&#038;d=mm&#038;r=r' srcset='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/c1b0e38cd5573602ca7f908eb3b2abd0?s=120&amp;d=mm&amp;r=r 2x' class='avatar avatar-60 photo' height='60' width='60' /><span itemprop="name"><a href="http://athenadesignsbyk.com" class="comment-author-link" rel="external nofollow" itemprop="url">karla</a></span> <span class="says">says</span>			</p>

			<p class="comment-meta"><time class="comment-time" datetime="2016-02-05T10:58:06+00:00" itemprop="datePublished"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/#comment-7749" class="comment-time-link" itemprop="url">February 5, 2016 at 10:58 am</a></time></p>		</header>

		<div class="comment-content" itemprop="text">
			
			<p>I looked forward to it in a way, but I always wanted to add a girl to my boys&#8230;. so I kept trying&#8230;. and ended with a huge age gap, and I&#8217;m not sure we will ever reach the empty nester stage.  My oldest is on his own. Own place and all, middle is in college and I have his room for my dream area.  Youngest is 7 and I love him dearly&#8230;. and yes it&#8217;s 3 boys for me.  My hubby is almost 60 and I&#8217;m almost 50, so instead we are facing a different reality than originally we planned, but it&#8217;s not bad, just different.  One day we will be home alone hopefully after my youngest heads off to school or where he wants, and will hopefully still have the mobility to do the things we wanted, but until then &#8211; we will enjoy what we have&#8230;.</p>
		</div>

		<div class="comment-reply"><a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/?replytocom=7749#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-7749", "7749", "respond", "15940" )' aria-label='Reply to karla'>Reply</a></div>
		
	</article>
	</li><!-- #comment-## -->

	<li class="comment odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1" id="comment-7747">
	<article itemprop="comment" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment">

		
		<header class="comment-header">
			<p class="comment-author" itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">

			<p class="comment-meta"><time class="comment-time" datetime="2016-02-04T19:43:40+00:00" itemprop="datePublished"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/#comment-7747" class="comment-time-link" itemprop="url">February 4, 2016 at 7:43 pm</a></time></p>		</header>

		<div class="comment-content" itemprop="text">
			
			<p>I am looking forward to traveling more and taking up more hobbies and crafts. I think I will also get more into volunteering and helping others. Giving my time is something I look forward too when the kids get older</p>
		</div>

		<div class="comment-reply"><a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/?replytocom=7747#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-7747", "7747", "respond", "15940" )' aria-label='Reply to kita'>Reply</a></div>

My sons have helped out at church as well and I couldn&#8217;t be more proud. <img src="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/wp-includes/images/smilies/simple-smile.png" alt=":)" class="wp-smiley" style="height: 1em; max-height: 1em;" /></p>

	<li class="comment odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1" id="comment-7738">
	<article itemprop="comment" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment">

		
		<header class="comment-header">
			<p class="comment-author" itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
				<img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/37a9c8f40c5255e3eff6305173f3caf7?s=60&#038;d=mm&#038;r=r' srcset='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/37a9c8f40c5255e3eff6305173f3caf7?s=120&amp;d=mm&amp;r=r 2x' class='avatar avatar-60 photo' height='60' width='60' /><span itemprop="name"><a href="http://resources.sueblimely.com" class="comment-author-link" rel="external nofollow" itemprop="url">Sue Bride</a></span> <span class="says">says</span>			</p>

			<p class="comment-meta"><time class="comment-time" datetime="2016-02-04T02:41:39+00:00" itemprop="datePublished"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/#comment-7738" class="comment-time-link" itemprop="url">February 4, 2016 at 2:41 am</a></time></p>		</header>

		<div class="comment-content" itemprop="text">
			
			<p>Two of mine have left the nest, one flew 3000k to the other side of Australia, the other lives in the city adjoining mine. It was hard when they first left but they are happy and doing jobs they enjoy.  My youngest, age 25, has an intellectual disability and will always be with us. When he was young I worried that I would never experience the freedom of the empty nest. Now I&#8217;m really pleased that I don&#8217;t have to &#8211; I kinda got used to having him around <img src="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/wp-includes/images/smilies/simple-smile.png" alt=":-)" class="wp-smiley" style="height: 1em; max-height: 1em;" /></p>
		</div>

		<div class="comment-reply"><a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/?replytocom=7738#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-7738", "7738", "respond", "15940" )' aria-label='Reply to Sue Bride'>Reply</a></div>
		
	</article>
	<ul class="children">

	<li class="comment even depth-2" id="comment-7740">
	<article itemprop="comment" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment">

		
		<header class="comment-header">
			<p class="comment-author" itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
				<img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/3c65505f2f252a8c4df96869f14a0427?s=60&#038;d=mm&#038;r=r' srcset='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/3c65505f2f252a8c4df96869f14a0427?s=120&amp;d=mm&amp;r=r 2x' class='avatar avatar-60 photo' height='60' width='60' /><span itemprop="name"><a href="http://www.notnowmomsbusy.com" class="comment-author-link" rel="external nofollow" itemprop="url">Corina Ramos</a></span> <span class="says">says</span>			</p>

			<p class="comment-meta"><time class="comment-time" datetime="2016-02-04T11:35:16+00:00" itemprop="datePublished"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/#comment-7740" class="comment-time-link" itemprop="url">February 4, 2016 at 11:35 am</a></time></p>		</header>

		<div class="comment-content" itemprop="text">
			
			<p>Hi Sue,</p>
<p>My daughter moved a couple hours away to attend school but the night she had a car accident it felt like she was thousands of miles away because we couldn&#8217;t get to her that night but I was there by 7am tne next day to pick her up.</p>
<p>I&#8217;m not quite the empty nester yet but my sons are grown. One is saving money to move out &#8211; although he has no timeline and my other son has epilepsy. I thought he would be the one to stay with us forever but the meds he&#8217;s on are helping him and he told me as soon as he&#8217;s cleared by the doctor to work and drive he&#8217;s going to save money and move to Colorado. Go figure. <img src="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/wp-includes/images/smilies/simple-smile.png" alt=":)" class="wp-smiley" style="height: 1em; max-height: 1em;" /></p>
<p>I&#8217;ve gotten used to having them around too&#8230;It&#8217;s going to be hard when they move but I know they have a life to live and can&#8217;t be a mama&#8217;s boy forever, I wish though. <img src="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/wp-includes/images/smilies/simple-smile.png" alt=":)" class="wp-smiley" style="height: 1em; max-height: 1em;" /></p>
<p>Thanks for reading my post and for leaving a comment. Hope you&#8217;re having a great week!</p>
<p>Cori</p>
		</div>

		<div class="comment-reply"><a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/?replytocom=7740#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-7740", "7740", "respond", "15940" )' aria-label='Reply to Corina Ramos'>Reply</a></div>
		
	</article>

	<li class="comment odd alt thread-even depth-1" id="comment-7736">
	<article itemprop="comment" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment">

		
		<header class="comment-header">
			<p class="comment-author" itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
				<img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/65fffee2bd1f1a81151abf879d75e806?s=60&#038;d=mm&#038;r=r' srcset='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/65fffee2bd1f1a81151abf879d75e806?s=120&amp;d=mm&amp;r=r 2x' class='avatar avatar-60 photo' height='60' width='60' /><span itemprop="name"><a href="http://donnamerrilltribe.com" class="comment-author-link" rel="external nofollow" itemprop="url">Donna Merrill</a></span> <span class="says">says</span>			</p>

			<p class="comment-meta"><time class="comment-time" datetime="2016-02-04T00:09:21+00:00" itemprop="datePublished"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/#comment-7736" class="comment-time-link" itemprop="url">February 4, 2016 at 12:09 am</a></time></p>		</header>

		<div class="comment-content" itemprop="text">
			
			<p>Hi Cori,</p>
<p>When I became an empty nester, I wanted to do cart wheels down the street.  Maybe it is because I was a single mom and mothering was a 24/7 eagle eye job.  Sure I missed her but I sure was ready to embark on a new journey.</p>
<p>Reconnecting to my sweetie was the best.   And also eating dinner when I wanted was another perk.</p>
<p>-Donna</p>
		</div>

		<div class="comment-reply"><a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/?replytocom=7736#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-7736", "7736", "respond", "15940" )' aria-label='Reply to Donna Merrill'>Reply</a></div>

	<article itemprop="comment" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment">

		
		<header class="comment-header">
			<p class="comment-author" itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
				<img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/3c65505f2f252a8c4df96869f14a0427?s=60&#038;d=mm&#038;r=r' srcset='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/3c65505f2f252a8c4df96869f14a0427?s=120&amp;d=mm&amp;r=r 2x' class='avatar avatar-60 photo' height='60' width='60' /><span itemprop="name"><a href="http://www.notnowmomsbusy.com" class="comment-author-link" rel="external nofollow" itemprop="url">Corina Ramos</a></span> <span class="says">says</span>			</p>

			<p class="comment-meta"><time class="comment-time" datetime="2016-02-04T11:39:46+00:00" itemprop="datePublished"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/#comment-7741" class="comment-time-link" itemprop="url">February 4, 2016 at 11:39 am</a></time></p>		</header>

		<div class="comment-content" itemprop="text">
			
			<p>Hi Donna,</p>
<p>LOL&#8230;I can just imagine you doing cart wheels! <img src="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/wp-includes/images/smilies/simple-smile.png" alt=":)" class="wp-smiley" style="height: 1em; max-height: 1em;" /></p>
<p>My boys or guys aren&#8217;t quite ready to move out but they&#8217;re doing their own thing so that gives me and the hubs a chance to hang out and reconnect.  I love that we can go to a concert or get away for the weekend and not worry about a sitter. When they were little we hardly went out as a couple so now this is our time. <img src="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/wp-includes/images/smilies/simple-smile.png" alt=":)" class="wp-smiley" style="height: 1em; max-height: 1em;" /></p>
<p>Oh yes, I love that I don&#8217;t have to cook as much and the house stays clean&#8230;until the grandsons come over, lol.</p>
<p>Thanks for reading my post and for your comment. Here&#8217;s to empty nesters!</p>
<p>Happy Thursday!<br />
Cori</p>
		</div>

	<li class="comment odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1" id="comment-7735">
	<article itemprop="comment" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment">

		
		<header class="comment-header">
			<p class="comment-author" itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
				<img alt='' src='http://1.gravatar.com/avatar/dbe3b6579fb14e1d437686e659e94209?s=60&#038;d=mm&#038;r=r' srcset='http://1.gravatar.com/avatar/dbe3b6579fb14e1d437686e659e94209?s=120&amp;d=mm&amp;r=r 2x' class='avatar avatar-60 photo' height='60' width='60' /><span itemprop="name"><a href="http://www.miamiblogger.net" class="comment-author-link" rel="external nofollow" itemprop="url">Maria</a></span> <span class="says">says</span>			</p>

			<p class="comment-meta"><time class="comment-time" datetime="2016-02-03T22:31:17+00:00" itemprop="datePublished"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/#comment-7735" class="comment-time-link" itemprop="url">February 3, 2016 at 10:31 pm</a></time></p>		</header>

		<div class="comment-content" itemprop="text">
			
			<p>I am halfway there, one in college and one starting high school this year. Things have chabce now as they now can do whatever they want, they chose their friends over family. So it&#8217;s just my husband and I most of the time. Unfortunately, we are not financially able to go traveling and I do worry what it would be like once both kids are gone and in their own.</p>
		</div>

		<div class="comment-reply"><a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/?replytocom=7735#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-7735", "7735", "respond", "15940" )' aria-label='Reply to Maria'>Reply</a></div>
		
	</article>
	<ul class="children">

	<li class="comment even depth-2" id="comment-7742">
	<article itemprop="comment" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment">

		
		<header class="comment-header">
			<p class="comment-author" itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
				<img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/3c65505f2f252a8c4df96869f14a0427?s=60&#038;d=mm&#038;r=r' srcset='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/3c65505f2f252a8c4df96869f14a0427?s=120&amp;d=mm&amp;r=r 2x' class='avatar avatar-60 photo' height='60' width='60' /><span itemprop="name"><a href="http://www.notnowmomsbusy.com" class="comment-author-link" rel="external nofollow" itemprop="url">Corina Ramos</a></span> <span class="says">says</span>			</p>

			<p class="comment-meta"><time class="comment-time" datetime="2016-02-04T11:44:08+00:00" itemprop="datePublished"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/#comment-7742" class="comment-time-link" itemprop="url">February 4, 2016 at 11:44 am</a></time></p>		</header>

		<div class="comment-content" itemprop="text">
			
			<p>Hi Maria,</p>
<p>I still have two at home but hey&#8217;re grown so like you, it&#8217;s just me and the hubs most of the time.</p>
<p>We aren&#8217;t in the position to travel either, our daughter&#8217;s tuition is going to cost us an arm and a leg but we love getting away for the weekend. We live 45 minutes away from Galveston, TX so we&#8217;re close enough to get home in case of an emergency and far enough to have some alone time. <img src="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/wp-includes/images/smilies/simple-smile.png" alt=":)" class="wp-smiley" style="height: 1em; max-height: 1em;" /></p>
<p>Thanks for coming by to read my post and for your comment. Have a great day!</p>
<p>Cori</p>
		</div>

		<div class="comment-reply"><a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/?replytocom=7742#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-7742", "7742", "respond", "15940" )' aria-label='Reply to Corina Ramos'>Reply</a></div>
		
	</article>
	</li><!-- #comment-## -->
</ul><!-- .children -->
</li><!-- #comment-## -->

	<li class="comment byuser comment-author-19jeep97 odd alt thread-even depth-1" id="comment-7733">
	<article itemprop="comment" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment">

		
		<header class="comment-header">
			<p class="comment-author" itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
				<img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/9f8e13e96259beaf6aa51dec6aa3948c?s=60&#038;d=mm&#038;r=r' srcset='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/9f8e13e96259beaf6aa51dec6aa3948c?s=120&amp;d=mm&amp;r=r 2x' class='avatar avatar-60 photo' height='60' width='60' /><span itemprop="name"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com" class="comment-author-link" rel="external nofollow" itemprop="url">Brenda</a></span> <span class="says">says</span>			</p>

			<p class="comment-meta"><time class="comment-time" datetime="2016-02-03T17:37:28+00:00" itemprop="datePublished"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/#comment-7733" class="comment-time-link" itemprop="url">February 3, 2016 at 5:37 pm</a></time></p>		</header>

		<div class="comment-content" itemprop="text">
			
			<p>Hey Cori!</p>
<p>I can imagine how one&#8217;s life would be turned upside down a bit from having children around to having none. Kinda like getting your second honeymoon, right? I&#8217;m sure some would use the extra bedroom(s) for something else but then there are those who would keep the room(s) as they were for when the kids came home.</p>
<p>It&#8217;s something I&#8217;ll never be able to experience but I&#8217;ll live through your experience. Thanks for sharing this with us!</p>
<p>Bren</p>
		</div>

		<div class="comment-reply"><a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/?replytocom=7733#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-7733", "7733", "respond", "15940" )' aria-label='Reply to Brenda'>Reply</a></div>
		
	</article>
	<ul class="children">

	<li class="comment even depth-2" id="comment-7743">
	<article itemprop="comment" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment">

		
		<header class="comment-header">
			<p class="comment-author" itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
				<img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/3c65505f2f252a8c4df96869f14a0427?s=60&#038;d=mm&#038;r=r' srcset='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/3c65505f2f252a8c4df96869f14a0427?s=120&amp;d=mm&amp;r=r 2x' class='avatar avatar-60 photo' height='60' width='60' /><span itemprop="name"><a href="http://www.notnowmomsbusy.com" class="comment-author-link" rel="external nofollow" itemprop="url">Corina Ramos</a></span> <span class="says">says</span>			</p>

			<p class="comment-meta"><time class="comment-time" datetime="2016-02-04T12:55:48+00:00" itemprop="datePublished"><a href="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/#comment-7743" class="comment-time-link" itemprop="url">February 4, 2016 at 12:55 pm</a></time></p>		</header>

		<div class="comment-content" itemprop="text">
			
			<p>Hey Bren,</p>
<p>I does kind of feel like a second honeymoon. We&#8217;re having a great time hanging out. We can take off whenever we&#8217;d like &#8211; that&#8217;s when the hubs isn&#8217;t working, lol.</p>
<p>We turned the extra bedroom into the grandsons room but Marisa still has stuff in there too. She doesn&#8217;t know it yet, but she&#8217;s sharing it with them. <img src="http://www.mygirlyparts.com/wp-includes/images/smilies/simple-smile.png" alt=":)" class="wp-smiley" style="height: 1em; max-height: 1em;" /></p>
<p>Thanks for having me gf!</p>
<p>Cori</p>
		</div>

		<div class="comment-reply"><a rel='nofollow' class='comment-reply-link' href='http://www.mygirlyparts.com/2016/02/the-benefits-of-becoming-an-empty-nester/?replytocom=7743#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-7743", "7743", "respond", "15940" )' aria-label='Reply to Corina Ramos'>Reply</a></div>
		
	</article>
	</li><!-- #comment-## -->
</ul><!-- .children -->
</li><!-- #comment-## -->
</ol></div>				<div id="respond" class="comment-respond">

                    var version = "3.0.6.3";
                    var gasp_p = document.getElementById("gasp_p");
                    var gasp_cb = document.createElement("input");
                    var gasp_text = document.createTextNode(" It\'s not that I don\'t trust you but could you please CHECK the box?");
                    gasp_cb.type = "checkbox";
                    gasp_cb.id = "gasped";
                    gasp_cb.name = "gasped";
                    gasp_cb.style.width = "25px";
                    gasp_p.appendChild(gasp_cb);
                    gasp_p.appendChild(gasp_text);
                    var frm = gasp_cb.form;
                    frm.onsubmit = gasp_it;
                    function gasp_it(){
                    if(gasp_cb.checked != true){
                    alert("Whoops! Did you forget to CHECK the checkbox?");
                    return false;
                    }
                    return true;
                    }
                    </script>

<p><span class="alignleft"><img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/9f8e13e96259beaf6aa51dec6aa3948c?s=125&#038;d=mm&#038;r=r' srcset='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/9f8e13e96259beaf6aa51dec6aa3948c?s=250&amp;d=mm&amp;r=r 2x' class='avatar avatar-125 photo' height='125' width='125' /></span>I have over 28 years as an Administrative Assistant, including at the Executive Level. <script type='text/javascript'>
/* <![CDATA[ */
(function() {
	var dropdown = document.getElementById( "cat" );
	function onCatChange() {
		if ( dropdown.options[ dropdown.selectedIndex ].value > 0 ) {
			location.href = "http://www.mygirlyparts.com/?cat=" + dropdown.options[ dropdown.selectedIndex ].value;
		}
	}
	dropdown.onchange = onCatChange;
})();
/* ]]> */
</script>
